title: How Do I Change My Summoner Name?
body: The name i login with is (Removed), the name my client displays is also (Removed). I'm assuming my login is my username and the one in client is my summoner name. How would i change the in game one?

replies.body: You can't change your login name for various reasons, but you can purchase a Summoner (In-game) Name change through the client store in account options.
You really shouldn't just give away what your login name is. But the answer your question you do it in the shop by going to account once in the shop. It's 1300 RP  or 13900 IP.
Fair enough, i'll edit the post. Thx.
